  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BCFactory
    Suppose we wish to wrap a higher-level cryptographic element that uses a primitive interface in its inner implementation.
    CryptographicHashFactory
    CollResFactory has a member of type FactoriesUtility to which it delegates the actual creation of the object.
